name: Hit by reality, a game developer hires an artist because he is bad at art. Ep 1
name_original: Hit by reality, a game developer hires an artist because he is bad at art. Ep 1
description:
"Hit by reality, a game developer hires an artist because he is bad at art" is a 1-bit episodic top-down riddle-solving adventure game.

Follow the adventures of Kevin the game developer as he attempts to complete his game. The first episode sees him coming to terms with reality and finally deciding to hire an artist. He would have to solve riddles and puzzles along the way and meet a variety of characters.

The game is presented as a top-down adventure with simple controls and the story is told mostly through dialogue. Enjoy~

Controls:

Movement - Arrow keys

Interact/Select - X

Back - Z

Menu - Esc
